description.translate: A will of metal, which not even the torrent or the storm diminishes.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Infranchissable\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Une volonté de métal, que même\"}","{\"text\":\"§7le torrent ou la tempête n'amenuise.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7A will of metal, which not even\"}","{\"text\":\"§7the torrent or the storm diminishes.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HER§a1 §7LUC§c-1\"}"]}}
